question: Who has become the 1st Indian youngster to won the Junior Debate Championship at the World Scholar’s Cup 2018?
explanation: Aadi Sai Vijaykaran, a 13-year-old from Chennai, has created history by winning the Junior Debate Championship at the World Scholar’s Cup held at Yale University, the USA from November 16-21. He has been adjudged the world’s best School debater at a global contest. This is the first time an individual from India has won the coveted title. The theme for the cup was ‘An Entangled World: diplomacy, human relationships, the science of memory, and literature, art\'.  Vijaykaran is a trained Carnatic musician, has a black belt in Karate, plays chess and football.
